name: sail-fossil
effect: Can be revived into an Amaura.
short_effect: Can be revived into an Amaura.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.
